item.title: Linux Command - CRON
item.description: Linux CRON 命令 CREATE A CRON SCRIPT TO CLEAN Edit the /opt/daily-clean.sh file #!/bin/bash # docker docker system prune -f docker builder prune -f docker volume prune -f # /home/puaiuc/ find /home/puaiuc/ -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -iname "*" ! -iname ".*" \) -delete Now give the file executable permission chmod a+x /opt/daily-clean.sh Edit the crontab file to schedule it crontab -e In our case, we have scheduled it to every day at the start of the day
